channel.title: RuneFlux [639] - Continuing the legacy
channel.description:
[CENTER]RuneFlux
[b]What is RuneFlux?[/b]
RuneFlux is a classical 639 set in the 2011 Runescape Era, as all of the 639's are no longer available, we set to stand out, and offer as much content as possible, with as many constant updates as possible. Currently, the game offers all the typical 639 features, Corp, Safety Dungeon.
[url=http://RuneFlux.com]Website & Forums[/url] [url=http://runeflux.com/downloads/client.jar] Play Now[/url]
[b]Features Include:[/b] - Fully Working Grand Exchange - Working Soul Wars Minigame - Working Duel Arena - Working Fight Caves - Working Bounty Hunter - Bosses (Godwars (Nex, Bandos, Armadyl, Kree'ara, Zamorak), Kalphite Queen, Dagannoth, Nomad, King Black Dragon, Jad, Corporeal Beast, Giant Mole, Balance Elemental, Avatars of Creation & Destruction, Pest Queen, Bork, Penance Queen, Tormented Demons) - Working Farming with offline growth - Fletching - Woodcutting - Fully Working Clan Wars Minigame - Auto Voting System - Auto Donation System - Moderator Ticket System - Info Book and Command book - Constant Updates (Every 2-3 days) - 24/7 Uptime - Ran on a 10Gbit Bandwidth VPS (ensuring thereís no lag) - Fully Working Nex - Barrows Brothers - Dicing - Clan Chat System w/ lootsharing - Fletching - Herblore - Questing - Shops taking different currencies (Tokkul, Vote Tokens) - Fast Leveling - Improved Combat Formulae - Bank Tabs - Skull Sceptre
[spoiler=Media] [img]http://i.imgur.com/w8q6uoh.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Uo0W5dk.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/SxXPWqJ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/rKHxOYo.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/7UlQ4rQ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/y5veJRb.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Z2XvMnN.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/NiT7ejd.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/jOAj5x7.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/yHDU0Eh.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/tElmCia.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/WGDDVRn.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/b2YTllD.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Hoerfwi.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/mNqUGSu.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/wrbxnKy.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/WtgwoFu.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/qIJxhAe.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Dn9q60V.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/w9fZEd6.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/HnC3equ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/8smm48u.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/qLDCiZ6.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/C7OdWeP.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ceVAwt4.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/lrARt3b.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/KsmWb9X.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/3t2BJI4.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/3IIWgjQ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/5AwgzMO.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/VG8MyOI.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/8cyO7sr.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/lP2pVFj.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/bnesMMO.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/756Uifg.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/6SGL39T.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/L8C9P1l.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/f9Y89Ga.png[/img]

item.title: RuneFlux [639] - Continuing the legacy
item.dc:creator: @Mezzyscape562 Mezzyscape562
item.description:
@Mezzyscape562 wrote:

Soulcist:

Awh… requiring remembers to register to view the forum, that depresses me. Anyhow, from the content we’re not seeing much here but as you said at the bottom, I’ll be happy to wait. Good luck!

Thanks, just getting it all set up, making sure most bugs, glitches & dupes are fixed. Implementing Highscores, and all that stuff before adding content. As for the website, I have no idea how my admin managed that, I’ll ask him to remove it as soon as possible.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneFlux [639] - Continuing the legacy
item.dc:creator: @Mezzyscape562 Mezzyscape562
item.description:
@Mezzyscape562 wrote:

[CENTER]RuneFlux

What is RuneFlux?

RuneFlux is a classical 639 set in the 2011 Runescape Era, as all of the 639’s are no longer available, we set to stand out, and offer as much content as possible, with as many constant updates as possible. Currently, the game offers all the typical 639 features, Corp, Safety Dungeon.

Website & Forums
Play Now

Features Include:

  • Fully Working Grand Exchange
  • Working Soul Wars Minigame
  • Working Duel Arena
  • Working Fight Caves
  • Working Bounty Hunter
  • Bosses (Godwars (Nex, Bandos, Armadyl, Kree’ara, Zamorak), Kalphite Queen, Dagannoth, Nomad, King Black Dragon, Jad, Corporeal Beast, Giant Mole, Balance Elemental, Avatars of Creation & Destruction, Pest Queen, Bork, Penance Queen, Tormented Demons)
  • Working Farming with offline growth
  • Fletching
  • Woodcutting
  • Fully Working Clan Wars Minigame
  • Auto Voting System
  • Auto Donation System
  • Moderator Ticket System
  • Info Book and Command book
  • Constant Updates (Every 2-3 days)
  • 24/7 Uptime
  • Ran on a 10Gbit Bandwidth VPS (ensuring thereís no lag)
  • Fully Working Nex
  • Barrows Brothers
  • Dicing
  • Clan Chat System w/ lootsharing
  • Fletching
  • Herblore
  • Questing
  • Shops taking different currencies (Tokkul, Vote Tokens)
  • Fast Leveling
  • Improved Combat Formulae
  • Bank Tabs
  • Skull Sceptre

[spoiler=Media]





































[/spoiler][/CENTER]
